name: Ghost Beat
description:
Ghost Beat is a rhythm based precision platformer.



  • Rhythm-based Action Platformer
  • Minimal design
  • Epic handcrafted levels synchronized to the music
  • Simply and easy to play but hard to master
  • Improve your musical rhythm and reflexes



Hi, I'm Sandor Berczi, a solo indie game developer.
It's always been a dream of mine to make a video game.
Please wishlist my dream project!
